cab.content: From Viceroy, Foreign Department, 21st July 1919. (Received 11.30 p.m.)1070 S. Afghanistan. Reference our telegram of the 20th July, 1066. Receipt of the Amirs letter definitely announces arrival of delegates on 24th instant^ coupled with dispersal of Afridi gathering has cleared air. Negotiations at Rawal Pmdi will begin probably on 26th July.
